message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I'm looking for a good deal and I'm willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to pay a fair price. However, I was thinking that the product is worth a bit more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I understand your perspective, Alice. Considering my budget, I'm comfortable paying up to $130 for the product.
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit further. How about we meet at $132.50?
